select * from (select rownum as rnum, sub.* from (select distinct lecture_id, lecture_class, lecture_name, professor_name from Lecture join LectureTime using (lecture_id, lecture_class) where is_temp_date is null
and lecture_name like '%'||#{searchData}||'%'
and professor_name like '%'||#{searchData}||'%'
order by lecture_id) sub) where rnum >= #{startIdx} and rnum <= #{endIdx}
mapper.insert: insert into LectureApply (lecture_id, user_id, lecture_class, is_president) values (#{lectureId}, #{userId}, #{lectureClass}, #{isPresident})
mapper.select: select lecture_time_id, lecture_start, lecture_end, lecture_week, lecture_id, lecture_name, professor_name, lecture_class, lecture_place, is_president from LectureTime join LectureApply using (lecture_id, lecture_class) join Lecture using (lecture_id, lecture_class) where user_id = #{userId} and is_temp_date is null

select lecture_start, lecture_end, lecture_week, lecture_name, lecture_class, lecture_place from LectureTime join LectureApply using (lecture_id, lecture_class) join Lecture using (lecture_id, lecture_class) left join CancelLecture using (lecture_time_id) where user_id = #{user_id} and (is_temp_date > sysdate or is_temp_date is null) and (cancel_date < sysdate or cancel_date is null)
select * from LectureTime where lecture_id = #{lectureId} and lecture_class = #{lectureClass} and is_temp_date is null
mapper.insert: insert into LectureTime (lecture_id, lecture_class, lecture_start, lecture_end, lecture_place, lecture_week, is_temp_date) values (#{lectureId}, #{lectureClass}, #{lectureStart}, #{lectureEnd}, #{lecturePlace}, #{lectureWeek}, #{isTempDate})
mapper.select: select * from CancelLecture where lecture_time_id = #{lectureTimeId} and cancel_date > sysdate
